titles.title: Fear not O land be glad and rejoice

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Fear not O land be glad and rejoice
For the Lord will do great things
The tree and the vine will yield their fruit
And the wilderness shall spring
Be glad ye children of Zion
For He has sent the rains
Your storehouse shall be full of wheat
Wine and oil will overflow

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
And you shall eat in plenty and be satisfied
And praise the name of the Lord your God
For I have dealt wondrously with you
And My people shall never be ashamed
And you shall know that I am in the midst of thee
That I alone am the Lord your God
I will pour out my Spirit upon all flesh
And My people shall never be ashamed
And My people shall never be ashamed
